title: [QUESTION]  plans to implement support of GPU in MAUI?
body:
I have a Xamarin forms project where i use SkiaSharp.Views.Forms and  SKGLView with good performance i am porting this project to MAUI and since the SKGLView is not implemented i use  SKCanvasView and it is SLOW in MAUI, so i my question is, is there any plan to implement support of GPU in SkiaSharp.Views.Maui?
Thanks
